content: I am enchanted to meet you.
author: Taylor Swift

content: 星星发亮是为了让每一个人有一天都能找到属于自己的星星
当一个人情绪低落的时候，他会格外喜欢看日落。
愿你我来日方长，平安喜乐

please don't be in love with someone else.
Please don't have somebody waiting on you.
author: Taylor Swift

content: Well you only need the light when it's burning low
author: Passenger

content: 太阳太远了, 否则我要埋在哪里
author: 海子

content:
满地都是六便士
他却抬头看见了月亮
from: 刘瑜 评 <月亮与六便士>

content:
But are we all lost stars,
trying to light up the dark?
Yesterday I saw a loin kiss a deer.

我相信，那一切都是种子。
只有经过埋葬，才有生机
author: 顾城

content: 没有一个海湾，比渴求的眼睛更深
author: 顾城
